title: Book of Changes
data:
{{obsolete}}
{{flavour|"A student's primer to the magic arts of Transmutations, filled with lavish illustrations of spellcasting mistakes: half-wizard-half-spiders, blade noses, beaked tentacles where legs belong. The text is full of reassurances that these almost never happen."}}

The '''book of Changes''' contained low-level [[Transmutations]] spells.

==History==
*This book was removed in [[0.31]] with the replacement of form spells by [[talisman]]s.
*Prior to [[0.27]], this book contained [[Ice Form]] and [[Blade Hands]], and was part of the [[Transmuter]] start.
*Prior to [[0.26]], this book contained [[Sticks to Snakes]] instead of [[Wereblood]].
*Prior to [[0.12]], this book contained [[Fulsome Distillation]] and [[Evaporate]] instead of [[Beastly Appendage]] and [[Sticks to Snakes]].
*Prior to [[0.8]], this book contained [[Dig]].
